General.Name: Jet Freight Logistics Limited
General.Description: Jet Freight Logistics Limited engages in the freight forwarding business in India. The company offers air and ocean freight, door-to-door cargo delivery, warehousing, customs clearance, chartering, and buyers and sellers consolidation services. It manages perishable cargo, including frozen and temperature-controlled cargo, such as pharmaceuticals, vaccines, bulk drugs, vegetables, fruits, cut flowers, tissue culture, etc.; general and time sensitive cargo; hazardous cargo; and heavy lift, over dimensional, and break-bulk cargo. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.
